Mugihe CaseActive ihinduye aya Masezerano ya Service, CaseActive izahindura itariki 'Iheruka kuvugururwa' hejuru. Ushinzwe gusubiramo buri gihe verisiyo igezweho ya Serivisi. Gukomeza gukoresha Serivisi nyuma yizo mpinduka zose zakozwe bizaba bigize uburenganzira bwawe bwo kugengwa nizo mpinduka. Niba wanze ko hagira igihinduka kuri aya Masezerano ya serivisi, igisubizo cyawe cyonyine kandi cyihariye ni uguhagarika Serivisi ukurikije aya magambo.
These General Terms of Service apply to: Aya Mategeko rusange ya serivisi akurikizwa kuri serivisi muri rusange. Amagambo yinyongera akoreshwa kuri buri Serivisi yatanzwe ashyirwa kumurongo watanzwe hepfo ('Amabwiriza yinyongera ya serivisi').
Our proprietary software is a service pl: Porogaramu yihariye ni urubuga rwa serivisi twakira abakiriya bacu kugirango dutange serivisi zirambuye hepfo. Kwiyandikisha kuri Serivisi, ugomba gukora urupapuro rwabigenewe kuri iyo Serivisi kandi / cyangwa ukuzuza kwiyandikisha kuri iyo serivisi. Ufite uburenganzira gusa bwo gukoresha Serivisi wiyandikishije kandi wishyuye, kandi imikoreshereze ya Serivisi ikurikiza kubahiriza amategeko n'amasezerano yose. Uremera kandi ukemera ko tubitse uburenganzira bwo guhindura Serivisi (cyangwa igice cyayo) buri gihe kandi ko tutazabaryozwa cyangwa undi muntu uwo ari we wese kugirango duhindure Serivisi.
1.2 Description of CaseActive Service: C: 1.2 Ibisobanuro bya serivisi ya CaseActive: Serivise ya CaseActive ni suite ya serivise yakiriwe na serivise zo gucunga abakiriya kumurongo zitangwa na CaseActive LLC. Kwiyandikisha gutemba wemeye, cyangwa Ifishi yo gutumiza wakoze, igaragaza serivisi ya CaseActive wiyandikishije, igihe cyo kwiyandikisha hamwe namafaranga wishyurwa nawe kuri Service ya CaseActive. Amabwiriza yinyongera akurikizwa mugukoresha serivisi ya CaseActive yashyizweho kuri:
You may subscribe to any additional Serv: Urashobora kwiyandikisha kuri Serivisi zinyongera, harimo Serivisi nshya nkuko zishobora kuboneka na CaseActive buri gihe, cyangwa ukongera Serivisi zisanzweho ukoresheje urupapuro rwabigenewe cyangwa iyandikwa ryinjira, nkigice cya Serivisi. Buri fomu nshya yo kwiyandikisha cyangwa Ifishi yo gutumiza izaba irimo igiciro nitariki yo kwishyuriraho (s) ya Serivisi zongerewe icyo gihe. Serivisi zose nshya zigengwa naya Masezerano rusange yumurimo hamwe nandi mabwiriza yose yinyongera ashobora gukoreshwa muburyo bwihariye.
Provided you have paid all fees payable: Mugihe wishyuye amafaranga yose yishyuwe nawe kuri Serivisi, tuzakoresha imbaraga zubucuruzi zogutanga, nta kiguzi kuri wewe, serivisi zita kubuhanga kuri wewe hamwe nabakoresha bawe bemerewe kwiyandikisha kuri Serivisi. Uhagarariye serivisi zabakiriya azahabwa ibibazo byawe. Imanza zitagira imipaka zemewe kubakoresha byemewe. Inkunga yacu isanzwe iraboneka 24/7, usibye iminsi mikuru mikuru, irimo umunsi wo kwibuka, umunsi wubwigenge, umunsi wumurimo, gushimira, Noheri, numunsi mushya.
